bwwExcerpt: Broadway audiences might not immediately sense it from this vibrant new musical, but this year marks the 35th anniversary of Real Women Have Curves. Each iteration of Josefina López's groundbreaking script has gloriously championed body positivity, the vital contributions of immigrants who power the U.S., and the undeniable strength of Latina camaraderie. showScoreExcerpt: "The show pulses with a distinctly chingona spirit–it is bold and defiantly optimistic despite relentlessly biased"
